          <title>
            <string language="en">Esterification reaction that links the fatty acid to propane-1,2,3-triol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Esterifizierungreaktion, die die Fettsäure mit 
propane-1,2,3-triol bindet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réaction d'estérification qui joint l'acide 
gras à propane-1,2,3-triol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reação do esterification que liga o ácido 
fatty a propane-1,2,3-triol</string>

grasso a propane-1,2,3-triol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Esterification αντίδραση που συνδέει το λιπαρό οξύ
με το προπάνιο-1.2.3-τρηολ</string>

ácido graso a propane-1,2,3-triol</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the equation for the esterification reaction that links the fatty acid to propane-1,2,3-triol.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre l'équation pour la
